name: The last Light (LFStudio)
description:
You have the last Light on earth! Use it and defeat the leader of the horrors and save humanity from death.

Designed to be played in fullscreen mode

Use WASD to move and Space to attack

Developed by :

LFStudio https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOiYf2MQlYOzrLHiEV2_cXQ

Diego Caples

https://diegocaples.wixsite.com/diego
